## ImageProcessingPipelineBuilder.format() method

Specifies the output format of the image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
format(format: "jpg" | "png" | "webp"): this;
```

|  format | <code>&quot;jpg&quot; &#124; &quot;png&quot; &#124; &quot;webp&quot;</code> | Image format |
